short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Manage Your Experiments for Amazon sellers. Seller Central improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage Your Experiments (MYE) in Amazon Seller Central is a great tool for optimizing images and titles and more of your listings.  However, it is hidden away and easy to forget about.

This extension solves that problem by re-surfacing the status of your experiments into a small emoji on your inventory page where it's more likely to be seen and encourage you to run more tests, improve your listings, and make more sales.

You can now quickly glance to see the progress on your experiments from the inventory page.
